name: Cooperative Protocols
desc:
The Yukikaze and Korikaze hulls were specifically developed to be fielded in tandem. The Yukikaze features a powerful array of control devices and transmitters which allows it to provide detailed combat information for any nearby Korikaze-class vessels.

If any allied Korikaze-class ship is within %s SU, this ship counts its ECM rating as %s higher, has %s improved autofire accuracy, and gains %s additional top speed and acceleration.

If at least %s Korikaze-class ships are within this range, all bonuses are increased by %s.

name: Cooperative Protocols
desc:
The Korikaze and Yukikaze hulls were specifically developed to be fielded in tandem. The Korikaze has fine-tuned transcievers allowing it to accurately exchange information and combat data with a nearby Yukikaze-class vessel.

If an allied Yukikaze-class ship is within %s SU, this ship ignores %s of enemy ECM, counts its ECM rating as %s higher, and gains %s additional range for all weapons.
short: Bonus when grouped with a Yukikaze

name: Kassadari Engineering
desc:
A rare ship constructed by the Great Houses.

Equipped with a highly advanced %s of unknown design, permanently accelerating the ship's timeflow by %s. Armor is reduced by %s based on hull size to make room for the exposed components of the system and monthly supply cost is increased by %s. Furthermore the delicate machinery causes CR to decrease at doubled rate after peak performance time has passed.

In emergency situations the Temporal Circuit will enter overdrive mode. Activating automatically if hull integrity falls below %s, the time acceleration is boosted to %s.

Due to high power needs, all these effects are %s.

name: Advanced Ballistic Interface
desc: Enhanced mounts reduce the ordnance point cost of ballistic weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of all ballistic weapons.

name: Broadside Mounts
desc:
Weapon mounts specialized for broadside combat.
Reduces the OP cost of large weapons by %s and increases the health of all weapon mounts by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of all ballistic weapons.

name: Forced Overdrive
desc:
An unusual modification for Kassadari hulls and refits, redirecting power from the shields to the Temporal Conduit Grid, allowing for a %s. To at least partially counteract the loss of shields, the saved weight of a missing shield generator is used to instead mount additional armor plating %s.

(Can only be applied to Kassadari ships)
short: Sacrifices shields for permanent overdrive activation.

name: Temporal Travel Drive
desc: As the Temporal Circuit Grid installed on Kassadari vessels requires a massive powerspike to be powered up at the start of battle, the system is linked to the ship's travel drives. Diverting energy from the drives upon entering combat, the grid is booted up in a supercharged state, catapulting the ship into battle under massively accelerated temporal flow.
short: Accelerates time while entering the battlefield.

name: Cramped Hangar Bays
desc: Fitting an overly large number of fighter bays has come at the cost of particularly cramped decks, making it harder to quickly service and rearm fighters in combat. As a consequence fighter refit times are increased by %s.

name: Lifeless Systems
desc:
This unknown ship design is equipped with a %s of unknown design, resembling those found on Kassadari vessels accelerating its timeflow by %s and harbors at its core an advanced drone nanoforge, capable of rapidly constructing drones in combat %s.

The high complexity of this technology increases monthly maintenance cost by %s.
short: Time acceleration and enhanced drone nanoforge.

name: Aftermarket Phase Coils
desc:
This ship is equipped with a set of salvaged phase coils and able to project a low-intensity phase field at all times, negating its sensor profile entirely. 

As the ship wasn't designed for phase coils however, strong interference with its targeting systems severely limits the range of its weapons past %s and maintenance costs are %s.
short: Reduces sensor profile and limits range.

name: Specialized Energy Mounts
desc:
Equipped with specialized energy mounts, the OP cost of large energy weapons is reduced by %s.

Furthermore, a modified flux grid allows for the overcharging of projectile-based energy weapons, increasing their damage by %s. This comes at the cost of a %s reduced rate of fire for all kinds of energy weapons.
short: Boosts energy weapon damage at cost of firerate.

name: Infernalis Drives
desc:
An unusually sophisticated drive modification for pirates, the Infernalis Drives increase top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s su based on hull size and raise the ship's burn level by %s. Additionally these drives have been equipped with improved emission shielding, reducing the ship's sensor profile by %s.  

Similarly to the common Unstable Injector modification, however, this refit comes at the cost of a %s reduction in weapon range and %s longer fighter replacement time.

name: Escape Afterburners
desc: Grants a boost to mobility once missile ordnance has been depleted
short: Grants a boost to mobility once missile ordnance has been depleted

name: Parallel Targeting Core
desc:
A specialized targeting core, optimized to equalize weapon ranges. Increases the range of non-missile weapons by %s for non-PD and %s for PD weapons up to a range of %s, after which its effect falls to %s effectiveness.

Incompatible with Integrated Targeting Unit and Dedicated Targeting Core.

name: Vund-Pattern Autoforge
desc:
This ship contains a large autoforge passively producing missile ammunition during combat. Restores %s of every missile weapon's base maximum ammunition %s.  

Unaffected by hullmods that increase maximum missile ammo.

name: Flux Catalyst
desc: The Trill houses an experimental flux catalyst system. Utilizing built-up flux, the ship is capable of supercharging its weapon, increasing its damage by up to %s as flux level increases.

name: Legio Engineering
desc: Legio Infernalis engineers have a hand for tuning drives for maximum performance, increasing top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s su/second based on hull size and increasing the zero flux speed boost by %s.
